description:
With decades of experience providing legal guidance to health care professionals throughout the country, Chapman Law Group in Sarasota, Florida, has a stellar reputation advocating for its clients. The team of experienced and knowledgeable attorneys focuses primarily on health care matters, representing nationwide clients facing legal challenges regarding regulatory issues, health care compliance, and criminal defense.

Medical professionals such as physicians, nurses, and pharmacists have benefited from the skills of the network of attorneys at Chapman Law Group, founded in 1985 by Ronald W. Chapman Sr. Recognized by his legal peers as an invaluable attorney, Mr. Chapman has made the Super Lawyers list in 2016 and 2017 as well as 2020 and 2021.

Working alongside Mr. Chapman is his team of skilled attorneys, who have a keen understanding of the profession and the law. In addition, approximately one-third of Chapman Law Group's attorneys earned a Master of Law degree in health law from the Loyola University Chicago School of Law.

Chapman Law Group knows that you have worked diligently toward becoming a health care professional. With that in mind, its skilled attorneys fight for what is important to you, and that includes your professional license, your reputation and your livelihood.

The law firm's practice areas include:

  • Healthcare law
  • Healthcare compliance
  • Healthcare fraud and healthcare-based criminal defense
  • Healthcare provider licensing defense
  • Regulatory compliance
  • Healthcare audit defense
  • HIPAA compliance, breach, and violations defense
  • Professional liability and malpractice defense
  • Healthcare corporate transactions and business matters

To support its nationwide clients, Chapman Law Group has three other offices. An additional Florida branch exists in Miami. The other two offices are in Troy, Michigan, and North Hollywood, California.
